# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of the changes in this PR.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Infrastructure/deployment change

## Changes Made
- List the specific changes made
- Be clear and concise
- Include any new files or dependencies

## Testing
- [ ] Ran `./verify-setup.sh` successfully
- [ ] Ran `./verify-credentials.sh` successfully (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested locally with Docker
- [ ] Tested deployment to staging environment
- [ ] Added/updated unit tests
- [ ] All existing tests pass

## Deployment Impact
- [ ] No deployment changes required
- [ ] Requires environment variable updates
- [ ] Requires Kubernetes manifest updates
- [ ] Requires Azure resource changes
- [ ] Requires new credentials/permissions

## Documentation
- [ ] Updated README.md if needed
- [ ] Updated relevant documentation in `docs/`
- [ ] Added inline code comments for complex logic
- [ ] Updated API documentation if applicable

## Security Considerations
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed in logs
- [ ] Credentials properly managed
- [ ] Security best practices followed
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published
